Salama,

Naharay fangatahana avy amin’ity adiresy email ity izahay mba hidirana amin’ny Congregation Program for Everyone. Raha maniry hiditra amin’ny kaontinao {{ email }} ianao, dia sokafy ity rohy manaraka ity:

Hiditra

Aza raharahaina fotsiny ity hafatra ity raha tsy nangataka an’ity rohy ity ianao.

Raha misy olana ka tsy mandeha ny rohy eo ambony, dia ampiasao indray ity rohy manaraka ity. Ataovy azo antoka tsara hoe tsy misy tapaka ny soratra rehetra amin’ilay rohy:
